Translations.Text: Teuma taeu roe si kaphe jadah Dijih jikaphe keu ayat Kamoe Arta jih nyoe jikheuen le leupah Arta dilon deungon aneuk lon Cit geubri keu lon hana peue peugah
Peue atra ghaeb bak jih ka meuri Ka jimeujanji dijih ngon Allah
Teutapi Kamoe akan meutuleh Bandum beu habeh peue nyang jipeugah Kamoe pupanyang azeueb lom keu jih
Pusaka bak jih Kamoe tueng bagah Pusaka jih nyan meutueng keu Kamoe Tinggai jih sidroe jiwoe bak Allah Badan jih sidroe jiwoe bak Kamoe
Awak jih meunoe cit dum lam salah Jipeugot laen dijih keu Tuhan Jih jikheuen tuhan nyang bukan Allah Nyan keu wali jih nyang peulindong jih
Tapi bandum jih dudoe jikeubah Si kaphe teuma ibadah keu jih Jeuet keu musoh jih teuma that leupah
Peue hana taeu meukirem chetan Kamoe yue padan dum kaphe jadah i Jipadan jiyue buet darohaka
Teuma bek gata talakei bagah Dikamoe bandum ka lheueh meukira Bandum keunira keu jih meukeubah
Ureueng takwa bak saboh uroe Meusapat keu noe Kamoe yue langkah Jeuet keu utosan nyang that mulia
Dum kaphe teuma meuparoh bagah Dalam nuraka meuparoh bandum Peudeh ngon reukueng jih grah sileupah b
Beurangsoe han ek jibri chupeu‘at 4 Meu kon Hadharat izin Neupeugah £ Meu ka na janji deungon Hadharat Ureueng nyan meuhat mantong nyang leupah
Awak nyan jikheuen Tuhan na aneuk
Keubit that s‘ok mʻok narit ka peugah Keubit narit nyan leupah that jeuheut
Ubena langet sang-sang ka bicah Beukah ngon bumoe runtoh ngon gunong
Han sagai patot na aneuk Tuhan Ureueng nyang kheun nyan raya that salah
Soe nyang di langet ngon nyang di bumoe Bandum ureueng nyoe cit hamba Allah Jak peunamiet droe bandum bak Tuhan
Bandum ureueng nyan Neutudum peugah Ka lheueh Neubileueng bandum le Tuhan
Jak dum bak Tuhan hana soe papah Uroe kiamat jak dum bak Tuhan Hana ngon rakan nyang jeuet seumeugah
